pageContext.claim: “He made up everything. John Bolton is a sick person. And John, and he's not a smart person. And he actually worked for me, because, frankly, I didn't talk to him much. There wasn't much to say. You're not going to learn much from the guy. He's just, you know, hardline to a point of stupidity.”
pageContext.analysis: Bolton worked for Trump 17 months, longer than any other national security adviser. Bolton insists he resigned. Trump often says he fired people who resigned if they later turn critical of him. Either way, it is virtually impossible that Trump "didn't talk [to him] much."
